EmailTemplate.name: Position filled
EmailTemplate.subject: Re: {!Lead.Job_Applying_For__c} Position
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
We have received your application for the {!Lead.Job_Applying_For__c} position. This position has been filled but we will keep your resume on file for future openings.
Thank you for your interest in Borrego Solar Systems!
Best regards, Pilar Agejas
Human Resources Manager Borrego Solar Systems, Inc 1365 N. Johnson Avenue, Suite 102 El Cajon, CA 92020 Tel – 619-562-7183 * 102 Fax – 619-562-4310
